DOC.brief_summary: Combination volatile opioid agent use achieve unconsciousness , haemodynamic stability analgesia surgical prosedures . This prospective , randomize , double-blind , control study evaluate effect two different dos morphine sulphate ( 0.1 mg/kg 0.2 mg/kg ) , desflurane consumption , recovery characteristic , postoperative analgesic requirement side effect total abdominal hysterectomy .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Morphine Desflurane Consumption Recovery Time
DOC.criteria: undergoing total abdominal hysterectomy general anaesthesia renal dysfunction ( cre > 1.2 ) , liver failure , cardiovascular , psychiatric , allergic metabolic disorder
